mapper.insert: insert into bbs_file (uuid, file_name, file_link, file_sign, file_type, file_size, down_count, uid, nickname, upload_time, upload_ip) values (#{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{fileLink}, #{fileSign}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{downCount}, #{uid}, #{nickname}, #{uploadTime}, #{uploadIp})
mapper.select: select file_name, file_link from bbs_file where uuid = #{uuid} and file_sign = #{sign}
select count(1) from bbs_file_down where uuid = #{uuid} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update bbs_file set down_count = down_count + 1 where uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_file_down (uuid, uid, nickname, down_time, ip) values (#{uuid}, #{uid}, #{nickname}, #{date}, #{ip})
